description.brief: Arbiter component to select/forward motion command.

package.description: Arbiter component to select and forward the appropriate motion command when using multiple sources at the same time - e.g. joystick, path following or other. The component accepts joystick message (used for selection), joystick motion command and path following motion command. The selected motion command is forwarded to the locomotion control. Code is based on [https://github.com/hdpr-rover/control-orogen-pancam_panorama] by Karl Kangur.
